content.html: Neurodivergent people can find it hard to identify their feelings and be susceptible to believing others who tell them how they should feel. Today, the narrative is we should be sad. Take the time to feel your own feelings today. Whatever they are, they are valid.
content.value:
Neurodivergent people can find it hard to identify their feelings and be susceptible to believing others who tell them how they should feel. 

Today, the narrative is we should be sad.

Take the time to feel your own feelings today. Whatever they are, they are valid.
